what: Estimate Error Rate of Services for Client of SSO
title: Estimate Error Rate of Services for Client of SSO
text: shared Service Organisation, SSO, administrative entity carries financial transaction behalf number client organisations. kind transactions done SSO clients. goal ssoestimate estimate monetary error rate transactions single client SSO. done using sample transactions SSO proxy. assumes efficient way estimate error rate means sampling: feasible example integral data-analyses transactions. one big assumption ssoestimate uses set transactions client random sample transactions carried SSO. Using assumption makes possible efficiently estimate error rate clients SSO. example suppose SSO processed 100,000 transactions, 10 clients. suppose want establish 95% confidence error rate client 1%, use (expecting errors samples) sample 300 transactions client, totalling 3000 transactions. Instead using ssoestimate suffices draw 350 transactions total conclude 95% confidence error rate client 1%. See example . small paper algorithm used forthcoming.

title: Estimate Error Rate of Services for Client of SSO
text: can install development version ssoestimate like :

title: Estimate Error Rate of Services for Client of SSO
text: example shows indeed 350 transactions (n_SSO = 350), turn errors (k_SSO = 0), suffice ascertain client 1000 transactions (N_client = 1000) 95% (cert = 0.95) certainty 1% errors (client max 0.010). estimated values SSO max, SSO post probable, SSO min, ditto client rounded based value S. precision estimation 1/(2*S). , higher value S gives better precision estimation. example precision 1/2000 = 0.0005.
code: library(ssoestimate) x <- SSO_estimate(k_SSO = 0, n_SSO = 350, N_client = 1000, S = 1000) SSO_graph_plot(x, cert = 0.95, visual = TRUE)

title: Estimate Error Rate of Services for Client of SSO
text: can show result estimation carried previous example also non visual. numbers shown non visual presentation raw results estimation; differ slightly visual example, former numbers rounded, latter rounded. can see, raw results give slightly misleading impression, know example, likely error rate SSO client 0.0, 0.0005.
code: SSO_graph_plot(x, cert = 0.95, visual = FALSE) #>          SSO_max    SSO_most_prob          SSO_min       client_max  #>           0.0085           0.0005           0.0005           0.0095  #> client_most_prob       client_min  #>           0.0005           0.0005

what: Estimation of error fraction in SSO and client. — SSO_estimate
title: Estimation of error fraction in SSO and client. — SSO_estimate
text: shared service organization, SSO, performs transactions various clients. transaction can potential wrong, partially wrong. get estimate error rate transactions can take random sample transactions SSO. random sample defined number transactions, n_SSO, sample, sum partial full errors found, k_SSO. Given number transactions specific client, N_client, can estimate error rate specific client. function makes estimation, using assumption can consider transactions client random sample transactions performed SSO. function returns probability graph error fraction SSO, probability graph error fraction client transactions estimation, function uses two dimensional grid postulated values error fractions SSO, client. dimensions grid granularity: S; makes easier compare two resulting probability curves.

title: Estimation of error fraction in SSO and client. — SSO_estimate
Estimation of error fraction in SSO and client. — SSO_estimate
text: k_SSO sum partial full errors found sample SSO. k_SSO non negative real number. Default 0. n_SSO number transactions sample SSO. n_SSO positive integer. Note follow convention use lower case n number transactions sample (case SSO transactions). Default 350. N_client number transactions client. N_client positive integer. Note follow convention use upper case N number transactions mass transactions (case client). Default 1000. S number segments, represented midpoints, divided dimensions two dimensional grid used computing probability graphs error fraction transactions SSO, errors transactions client. S granularity grid. S positive integer. Default 2000.

title: Estimation of error fraction in SSO and client. — SSO_estimate
code: - P_SSO, the probability graph of the error fraction in SSO     - P_client, the probability graph of the error fraction in the client transactions     - the input parameters

title: Estimation of error fraction in SSO and client. — SSO_estimate

what: Show the results of a call to SSO_estimate(). — SSO_graph_plot
title: Show the results of a call to SSO_estimate(). — SSO_graph_plot
text: function shows, visual TRUE, results call SSO_estimate() plot combining probability curves error fraction SSO transactions, error fraction client transactions. text plot shows rounded values min, probable, max values SSO client. visual FALSE, list min, probable, max values SSO client returned. case raw values min, probable, max returned, rounding done.

title: Show the results of a call to SSO_estimate(). — SSO_graph_plot
Show the results of a call to SSO_estimate(). — SSO_graph_plot
text: SSO_out output call SSO_estimate(). cert one sided certainty level min max values error fraction. Default 0.95. visual TRUE, plot returned. FALSE, list specific values returned. Default TRUE.

title: Show the results of a call to SSO_estimate(). — SSO_graph_plot
code: If visual is TRUE, a ggplot is returned.            If visual is FALSE, a named list is returned consisting of            - the max, most probable, and min values of the error fraction in SSO;            - and ditto for the client.

title: Show the results of a call to SSO_estimate(). — SSO_graph_plot
code: SSO_out <- SSO_estimate(k_SSO = 1, n_SSO = 3000, N_client = 500, S = 500) SSO_graph_plot(SSO_out)
